issue.title: Error with proxy invalidation when saving an organism's category
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Erreur lors de l'invalidation du cache du Proxy : java.lang.NoSuchMethodException: org.easysdi.proxy.hibernate.ProxyCacheInvalidationServlet.requestInvalidate()

**Fixed versions :** 4.2.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

In backoffice organism's category management or when affiliating an organism's category to some object (i.e. resource) ?

**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Yes, in category management.
